attributes.title: 2016 Ferrari F12

attributes.description:
Porsche 911 3.2 Carrera (G50) 
1989 | 76 000Km 
R1 999 900 

The best 3.2 Carrera available in South-Africa 

Full and comprehensive service history including vast number of invoices and documentation. 

Vehicle is currently fitted with Raven LED headlights imported from the USA, these can be found on singer models and cost R40 000 to import. They are a complete plug and play unit so the original headlights can be fitted within thirty minutes. 

This vehicle has undergone a minor “refresh” that involved full vehicle detailing, full vehicle paint protection film, re-anodizing of the wheels, brand new Michelin tyres and various other maintenance items for a car of this age. With no expense spared we can confidently say this vehicle will not require any major maintenance work for the foreseeable future.  

For more details, please get in touch with one of our concierges
attributes.title: 1989 Porsche 911 Carrera 3.2
